overview:
Joey Levin is the CEO of Mindspark, a consumer software company and operating business of IAC that houses a wide range of â€œdigital snacksâ€â€”fun, useful and popular products that make a consumerâ€™s digital life easier and more fun.

Prior to his appointment at Mindspark in November 2009, Mr. Levin served as Senior Vice President, Mergers & Acquisitions and Finance for IAC while also maintaining strategic oversight of Mindspark. Since joining IAC in 2003, Mr. Levin has also worked on a number of transactions for IAC including the acquisitions of ServiceMagic and People Media, and the spin-offs of Ticketmaster, Intercal Leisure Group, HSN, and LendingTree, completed in 2008. Prior to joining IAC, Mr. Levin worked in the Technology Mergers & Acquisitions group for Credit Suisse First Boston (now Credit Suisse) in San Francisco. In this capacity he advised public and private technology and e-commerce companies on a variety of transactions.

Joey also serves on the board of Tree.com, and private venture-backed companies The Active Network and Merchant Circle. He graduated from the Jerome Fisher Program in Management & Technology from the University of Pennsylvania, with a B.S. in Economics from the Wharton School, a B.A.S. in Engineering from the School of Engineering and Applied Sciences and a minor in Mathematics.
